contentList.content: Shadow Sorcery
You are a creature of shadow, for your innate magic comes from the Shadowfell itself.
Eyes of the Dark
You can see in the dark up to [1].
Eyes of the Dark: Darkness

You can spend 2 sorcery points to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="pie_Target_Darkness_EyesOfTheDark">Sorcerous Darkness</LSTag>, weaving your shadow magic to blind your enemies and see through darkness.
Sorcerous Darkness

Create a dark shroud that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of it. Additionally, gain the ability to see through magical darkness while you are <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentrating</LSTag> on this spell.
Eyes of the Dark
By channelling your own shadow magic, you gain the ability to see through magical darkness.
Strength of the Grave

Your existence in a twilight state between life and death makes you difficult to defeat. Once per long rest, when damage reduces you to 0 hit points, you instead drop to 1 hit point. You can't use this feature if you are reduced to 0 hit points by radiant damage or by a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Hound of Ill Omen

You gain the ability to call forth a howling creature of darkness to harass your foes. As a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>, you can spend 3 <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag> to summon a Hound of Ill Omen to attack the creature marked with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PIE_HOUND_OF_ILL_OMEN_TARGET">Ill Omen</LSTag>.
Hound of Ill Omen
Hound of Ill Omen: Mark Target
Marks a target with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PIE_HOUND_OF_ILL_OMEN_TARGET">Ill Omen</LSTag> for your Hound of Ill Omen. The hound can only attack the marked target.
Hound of Ill Omen: Summon Hound

Summon your Hound of Ill Omen to attack the creature marked with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PIE_HOUND_OF_ILL_OMEN_TARGET">Ill Omen</LSTag>. Additionally, while the hound is within [1] of the target, they have Disadvantage on Saving Throws spells you cast.
Bite
Bite a target and possibly knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Ill Omen
You have been marked as a target for a Hound of Ill Omen.
Ominous Howl
While the Hound of Ill Omen is within [1] of you, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against spells from its summoner.
Marked by Shadows
You are relentlessly tracked by a Hound of Ill Omen, and can't hide from it.
Hound of Ill Omen
This creature harasses only those marked by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="pie_Target_HoundOfIllOmen_SetTarget">Ill Omen</LSTag>.
%%% SHOULD BE INVISIBLE - Sorcerer that used Ill Omen
%%% SHOULD BE INVISIBLE - Overrides hound's unarmed attack with bite
%%% SHOULD BE INVISIBLE - Hound's hide-prevention aura
Shadow Walk

You gain the ability to step from one shadow into another. When you are Lightly or Heavily Obscured, you can use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> to magically teleport up to [1] to an unoccupied space you can see in a Lightly or Heavily Obscured area.
Shadow Walk
While Lightly or Heavily Obscured, you can magically teleport up to [1] to an unoccupied space you can see in a Lightly or Heavily Obscured area.
Shadow Curse Immunity
Your innate connection to the Shadowfell allows you to pass through Shadow Cursed Lands unharmed.
